Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
bandwagon \bandwagon\ n. 1. A popular trend that attracts growing support. ``when they saw how things were going everybody jumped on the bandwagon.'' [WordNet 1.5]
2. A large ornate wagon for carrying a musical band. ``the bandwagon led the circus parade'' [WordNet 1.5]

bandwagon n 1: a popular trend that attracts growing support; "when they saw how things were going everybody jumped on the bandwagon" 2: a large ornate wagon for carrying a musical band; "the gaudy bandwagon led the circus parade"
